app.name: Fast XML Parser
app.one_liner: Validate XML, parse XML to JS objects, and build XML from JS objects rapidly without C/C++ dependencies or callbacks.

screens.name: XML Processing Interface
screens.purpose: Allow users to input XML or JS objects and select parsing or serialization actions.

rust_commands.name: parse_xml
rust_commands.purpose: Convert XML string into a JavaScript object with configurable options.

rust_commands.name: build_xml
rust_commands.purpose: Serialize a JavaScript object into an XML string.

rust_commands.name: validate_xml
rust_commands.purpose: Check XML for syntactic validity using built-in validator.

mvp_plan: week 1: Implement core XML parsing logic
week 1: Expose configuration options for parser behavior
